00162  public function CMColor($red, $green, $blue, $alpha = 0) {
00163   list($this->red, $this->green, $this->blue, $this->alpha) =
00164    CMColor::ConvertColorToAbsolute($red, $green, $blue, $alpha);
00165  }
00166  
00176  public static function ConvertColorToAbsolute($red, $green, $blue, $alpha = 0) {
00177   if($red < 1)
00178    $red *= 255;
00179   if($green < 1)
00180    $green *= 255;
00181   if($blue < 1)
00182    $blue *= 255;
00183   if($alpha < 1)
00184    $alpha *= 127;
00185   
00186   return array($red, $green, $blue, $alpha);
00187  }
00188  
00193  public function getGDColor($resource) {
00194   return imagecolorallocatealpha($resource, $this->red, $this->green, $this->blue, $this->alpha);
00195  }
00196  
00201  public function __toString() {
00202   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00203  }
00204  
00205 }
